definitions.definition: Any of a number of species comprising the family Dipodidae , native to the deserts of Asia and northern Africa , being a small, jumping rodent with a long tufted tail, very small forefeet and very long hind legs .

main_definition: Any of a number of species comprising the family Dipodidae , native to the deserts of Asia and northern Africa , being a small, jumping rodent with a long tufted tail, very small forefeet and very long hind legs .
